uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.content

Interface SimpleXMLBuilder

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ExtendedXMLBuilder, XMLContentBuilder
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractXMLBuilder, HtmlBuilder, HtmlBuilder.Heading, HtmlBuilder.Panel, HtmlBuilder.SpanText, HtmlBuilder.Text, HtmlPrinter, HtmlWriter, JsonBuilder, NestedXMLBuilder, PropertyBuilder, SwingContentBuilder.XMLPanel, TextContentBuilder, XMLDomBuilder, XMLPrinter, XMLWriter

    public interface SimpleXMLBuilder
    Interface for classes that build XML This interface could either be used to build a DOM tree or perform simple text formatting. It should be more straight-forward to use than DOM but it does require the document to be built in a linear fashion. Elements are added in order and attributes must be added before element content.

      • attr

        SimpleXMLBuilder attr(java.lang.String name,
                      java.lang.CharSequence s)
        Add an attribute. It is only legal to call this after a call to open and before close or clean.
        Parameters:

        s - CharSequence attribute value or null for no value

      • getNested

        SimpleXMLBuilder getNested()
                    throws java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException
        Get a new SimpleXMLBuilder of the same type as this object. This is to build un-commited content that is appended to this object using the appendParent() method. The calling code need only hold a reference to the current builder as the appendParent() method returns the parent.
        Returns:
        SimpleXMLBuilder
        Throws:
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException

      • setEscapeUnicode

        boolean setEscapeUnicode(boolean escape_unicode)
        Should high code-point unicode characters be escaped to avoid charset problems. This is advisory only the implementation is free to ignore this call and return false in all cases.
        Parameters:
        escape_unicode -
        Returns:
        previous setting.
